data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Morbi to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Morbi, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 10,563 believers in Morbi to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary: On average, 78 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Morbi, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Morbi access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Morbi be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Memon people.
Pour your Spirit out on the 960,300 citizens of Morbi, Gujarat, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Morbi who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the county of Morbi, Gujarat, India has a population of 960,300.

We estimate Morbi has 10,563 people who might know Jesus, 11,652 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 938,085 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Morbi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
